そしてKilling Floor2に期待できる作品です！

Очень хороший, зубодробительный экшен с видом от первого лица  на тематику зомби апокалисиса. Потрясающее звуковое сопровождение, рпг-элементы в купе с расчленекой рождают редкого качества нетленку. Всем кто любит игры с коопом и зомби строго рекомендуется.

Fun on lower difficulties and challenging on higher. I've really enjoyed killing floor and kept playing it because new content was added often. Even with it's outdated graphics and killing floor 2 on the way I can still recommend this game.

The current game is pretty different due to all the updates: it hosts more weapons, more maps and a new playmode. Yes, it is a old game and will likely receive less updates with KF 2 on the way.. But at it's current state it's pretty nice imo. Try to play it with friends. Ofc you can play alone or with strangers, in fact, most of my gameplay I was playing with strangers against the zeds (zombies). That being said, killing the hordes of enemies with friends can be loads of fun.

See a low price of killing floor when it's on sale? Buy. It's worth it.

I think the devs overstepped a mark with this game. "Pikey" is used as a random insult by the *player*. No other game has the actual player say a racist word to demean people. No not even GTA. It's a big deal word, it's usage in the UK is very common and its worse than the N bomb word. The P word insults Irish and Roma travelers as it paints them as poor, sub working class criminals. The use/choice of the word has malice intent no matter how flippantly it is used.

I respect that fiction can go where it likes, but when the fiction puts words in the players mouth that essentially encourages  casual racism I think an unspoken boundary has been crossed.

It's plane, simple, and fun. There aren’t a whole lot of bells whistles when it comes to Killing Floor. It’s just you, 5 other people, and a boatload of zombies. The game doesn’t try to bore the player with backstory or cut scenes. It is just a down-to-the-bone wave based shooter. Some may think these are negative qualities, but it just makes for a great game to pick up and play for a little with some friends. 
It takes itself just serious enough without drying everything out. All the characters' dialoged lines are hilarious, easy to quote phrases that give the game its charm, but it is still a serious and difficult game. 
The community and developers are great. This may sound crazy but I pretty much only play this game during the holiday events in December. They update the game so all the enemies are reskinned to be Christmas themed. There are also holiday levels and remixed Christmas music. It just shows that the developers behind this game aren’t trying to make you cry or uncover truths about society; it's just an extremely fun and unique game that will that will give you hours of entertainment.  
Also the game is pretty challenging, they offer difficulties ranging from beginner to Hell on earth, yet I still can get destroyed on medium without any hesitation. Start low and work your way up, I can guarantee that you will have a great time.
